name: Beyondworld - Free To Play
description:
IN PRE-ALPHA DESCRIPTION

BeyondworlD is a LowPoly Survival Crafting Game. first person, open world. It's Like Rust, ARK. You Can build a base and Survival in the hostile environment. Take resources and Domesticate animals. Play with other players or Play with Your friends to Help protect your base. evolve your base And defense for other players. crafting and upgrade.  

Single Player have some bugs, but multiplayer working better.

System Requirements

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

  • 2 Core (Intel Pentium...)
  • Nvidia GeForce 210 - 2GB
  • 2GB RAM
  • 800MB free space
  • Windows 7/8/8.1/10 -64B(32B Soon)
  • Linux/Mac, Version (Coming soon)

RECOMMENDED SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

  • Intel i3/i5 (4 Core)
  • Nvidia Geforce GTX 660- 2GB
  • 6GB RAM
  • 800MB free space
  • Windows 7/8/8.1/10 -64B(32B Soon)
  • Linux/Mac, Version (Coming soon)
